comment: Very knowledgeable about Urban Design and research. When it comes to design, he has seen it all.  So he always has a project or research reference he can give you to strengthen your project. That being said, He wasn't very available over email so prepare for class so you can get enough feedback for the next class.

Professor Shpuza genuine interest in student success create a classroom environment where students feel valued and supported. His engaging teaching style and willingness to provide individualized attention to students to inspire and excel. Highly Recommended!
Had him for ETech III. Very knowledgeable professor. He makes class entertaining even when the lectures are heavy! Always ready to help and answer questions.

Being that we are now a hybrid class, Prof shupza does well when trying to work with students. He is very helpful and gives back great feedback. As long as you read the rubric and do what is required, you will be a-okay!
really original and inspirational, makes the lesson fun

Clear and straightforward, Prof. Shpuza offers an exemplary method operating academically: with a critical eye, pointed analysis, and open ears. He has great knowledge and does a wonderful job introducing students to Urban Design. He goes out of his way to help students with their projects, and has great feedback.
Great and smart ideas. Produced great project.

Professor Shpuza is a very dedicated and encouraging professor. Sure, there may be a cultural barrier for some, but nothing that should detract from learning. If anything, it enhances the curriculum. His commitment to students development, even several years after graduation, is honorable.

He is a good professor I would say.He is not very clear, thats many professors style and its almost impossible to be really clear as an architect!His presence as a professor from Europe in an American school is an advantage.
